item.title: Direct vs Hostdev Interfaces in nova
item.description: Mostly a note for myself. There are two types of SR-IOV’y networks supported in nova: direct and hostdev. Confusingly, the latter corresponds to passthrough of the virtual function (VF), while the former corresponds to macvtap.
